wiki.content:
"Misery Business" is the first single from Paramore's second album, Riot!. "Misery Business" was the third Paramore video to be directed by Shane Drake, and was nominated for the "Best Video" award at the Kerrang! Awards 2007, but lost to Fall Out Boy's "This Ain't a Scene, It's an Arms Race". "Misery Business" is also featured on the soundtrack to the EA Sports video game NHL 08 and was used in professional StarCraft's Shinhan Bank Proleague. It is also been included in the popular video game Guitar Hero World Tour, which Hayley Williams is also playable in. It was also heard in an episode of Degrassi.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
